de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.mapping

Interface IStoreObject<T,F>

  • Type Parameters:
    F - the type, which is used internally as format, like Json for instance

    public interface IStoreObject<T,F>
    The IStoreObject is building the bridge between the propriate format coming from out of the used IDataStore and the rest of the application. This can be a Json object or an internal format for later use of a ResultSet for instance

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object get(IField field)
      Get the defined property in the propriate format of the current driver
      F getContainer()
      Get the raw container, which stores the information
      T getEntity()
      Get the POJO entity, whihc was created from the stored information in the IDataStore
      java.util.Collection<IObjectReference> getObjectReferences()
      Retrive all instances of IObjectReference which were generated when rereading an instance from the datastore.
      boolean hasProperty(IField field)
      Checks wether for the given IField an entry is defined inside the current instance
      boolean isNewInstance()
      Get the information, wether the current instance is existing in the datastore or not.

      • hasProperty

        Checks wether for the given IField an entry is defined inside the current instance

        Returns:

      • get

        java.lang.Object get(IField field)
        Get the defined property in the propriate format of the current driver
        Parameters:
        field - the IField describing the property
        Returns:
        the value of the property in the propriate format of the current implementation of the IDataStore

        IStoreObject<T,F> put(IField field,
                      java.lang.Object value)
        Adds a new property into the internal container
        Parameters:
        field - the IField used to describe the property
        value - the value to be stored in the proprietary format
        Returns:
        a reference to itself

      • getObjectReferences

        java.util.Collection<IObjectReference> getObjectReferences()
        Retrive all instances of IObjectReference which were generated when rereading an instance from the datastore.
        Returns:
        all instances of IObjectReference

      • isNewInstance

        boolean isNewInstance()
        Get the information, wether the current instance is existing in the datastore or not. By this information it is decided, wether the record is inserted or updated
        Returns:
        true, if it exists already, false if not
